title: SCP-173

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Choose to snap the necks of all your visitors tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You may only snap necks 3 times.

desc: *It is constructed from concrete and rebar with traces of Krylon brand spray paint. SCP-173 is animate and extremely hostile. The object cannot move while within a direct line of sight.*
